page.title: 16Cwmbran's Leisure Facilities
page.content:
Torfaen has some of the best opportunities for leisure and enjoyment of any district in Wales and is still extending these amenities. There are three purpose built Leisure Centres in Cwmbran providing a wide range of ,activities for all age groups and families. There is also a golf club, a squash club, a riding club, many football clubs as well as the usual specialised groups. Eating out can be enjoyed at a wide range of town and country pubs, hotels and restaurants.The menus vary from a simple snack to a very elaborate dinner,from Oriental to Welsh cooking. To encourage the development of the Arts there is a theatre and exhibition gallery in the area.
Written by Philip and David (Oakfield)
